dialogue_turns.text: That's the one. And get this: over 640,000 visitors in just ten days! From Saudi Arabia and abroad, like.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, thirty-six grand! It's pretty wild. But Talal AlShamaisi, the CEO, he really highlighted how it's about preserving their rich falconry heritage.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, thirty-six grand! It's pretty wild. But Talal AlShamaisi, the C E O, he really highlighted how it's about preserving their rich falconry heritage.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Talal AlShamaisi, CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, hailed the exhibitions success in attracting global visitors and enthusiasts. He attributed this achievement to the strong backing of the Saudi Leadership, which is committed to preserving the nation's rich falconry heritage, in line with the objectives of Vision 2030.

dialogue_turns.text: That makes sense. And they even signed a bunch of strategic agreements, right? With national bodies and such.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, seven of them! To strengthen heritage, preserve environmental legacy, even support scientific research.

These partnerships aim to strengthen the Kingdoms cultural heritage, preserve falconrys environmental legacy, support scientific research, raise environmental awareness, and provide training and qualification programs.
